title: Kyeiwaa Marriage Saga: A Grand Scheme To Dent Her Integrity - Mercy Asiedu
content:
The outfit of embattled Actress Rose Afrakomah Mensah known as Akua Attaa Kyeiwaa has heatedly discredited the reports that she has snatched another woman rsquo;s husband. Rose Mensah and her newly engaged husband saga which has been trending for a while now after last Sunday lsquo;s engagement, has refused to settle, as more celebrit ......
